net.javacoding.jspider.core.task
Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
SchedulerImpl
public interface Scheduler

Interface that will be implemented upon each object that will act as a task scheduler. The Task scheduler will keep track of all work that is being done and all tasks that still have to be carried out. $Id: Scheduler.java,v 1.9 2003/04/03 15:57:18 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey

Method Detail

schedule

public void schedule(WorkerTask task)
Schedules a Worker Task to be executed. The scheduler will keep a reference to the task and return it later on to be processed.

Parameters:
task - task to be scheduled

block

public void block(java.net.URL siteURL,
                  DecideOnSpideringTask task)

unblock

public DecideOnSpideringTask[] unblock(java.net.URL siteURL)

flagDone

public void flagDone(WorkerTask task)
Flags a task as done. This way, we are able to remove the task from the in-process list.

Parameters:
task - task that was completed

getThinkerTask

public WorkerTask getThinkerTask()
                          throws TaskAssignmentException
TaskAssignmentException

getFethTask

public WorkerTask getFethTask()
                       throws TaskAssignmentException
Returns a fetch task to be processed

Returns:
Task to be carried out
Throws:
TaskAssignmentException - if all the work is done or no suitable items are found for the moment.

allTasksDone

public boolean allTasksDone()
Determines whether all the tasks are done. If there are no more tasks scheduled for process, and no ongoing tasks, it is impossible that new work will arrive, so the spidering is done.

Returns:
boolean value determining whether all work is done
